name: Get A Job: Where It All Began: The Cast of Get A Job
detailed_description: Get A Job has a fun cast with some of the most up-and-coming stars and several seasoned actors. Meet the cast and see how they all worked together on set as they reveal some of the worst jobs they had before getting into acting as well as their dream jobs.
about_the_game: Get A Job has a fun cast with some of the most up-and-coming stars and several seasoned actors. Meet the cast and see how they all worked together on set as they reveal some of the worst jobs they had before getting into acting as well as their dream jobs.
